text:
Zipcar is hiring software engineers! Help improve car sharing and bring Zipcar to new markets. Ruby/Rails/Scala, Backbone/RequireJS/Bower/Grunt/Gulp/Hadoop.

Make products that your friends and family will use.

https://www.zipcar.com/ Software engineer: http://jobvite.com/m?3W4RAgwc Senior software engineer: http://jobvite.com/m?3t5RAgwK
